title: 'F1 must rotate classic European tracks – for fans and the sport'
summary: Zandvoort is set to dissapear off the F1 calendar after 2026 –Katy Fairmanargues F1 should bring in new measures to give fans what they want and protect the championship's history

qa_pairs.question: Which track is set to leave the Formula 1 calendar after 2026?
What is one proposed measure to enhance the Formula 1 experience for fans?
wrong_options: Increase the number of night races

qa_pairs.question: Why is there a call for change in the F1 calendar?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: To give fans what they want and protect the championship's history
wrong_options: To increase the number of races per season
